reviews.title: Nice pair of hulk leggings
reviews.review_text: Bought these for a halloween costume. I'm a shorter, skinny dude. 5'7" and 28" waist. took a chance with the size small and they fit like a glove. Nice long inseam helps avoid squeezing my junk to smithereens, which I appreciate. ...Whatcha gonna do when my scrawny hulkamaniac legs runs wild on you?!

reviews.title: These are good !
reviews.review_text: Son is performing in Wedding singer and is a Hulk Hogan impersonator so these are great for that, he liked the fit, they were more orange than the yellow portrayed in the picture which was a bit disappointing. However they will do the job.
Got these for a halloween costume but was disappointed because the pants are supposed to be yellow and red, and they are not. They are orange and yellow. Will be returning.

reviews.title: Red and Yellow Leggings
reviews.review_text: These were absolutely horrible! I paid way too much for these leggings and when I got them they turned out to be orange tie dye and not even close to bright yellow and red. I will never order from here again.

reviews.title: Orange is not red
reviews.review_text: My pants arrived today and they are orange and yellow, not red and yellow. Now they don't match the rest of my costume. Cannot use. Ugh.

reviews.title: Not color shown in picture
reviews.review_text: The color was not red and yellow but ORANGE and yellow. Nothing like the picture at all. Will never buy from this company again.
